question:
Which among the following events took place during the time of Lord Curzon?
1. North-West Frontier Province was established
2. Queen Victoria died
3. Kolkata Corporation Law was passed
4. Partition of Bengal revoked
Choose the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: North-West Frontier Province was established in the year 1901 and it was named Khyber Pakhtunkhwa province in the year 2010. Queen Victoria died on 22nd January 1901. Kolkata Corporation Law was passed in 1899. Partition of Bengal was announced in the year 1905 during the time of Lord Curzon but revoked in the year 1911 during the time of Lord Hardinge II.
